column2: also Romanized as Najafābād) is a city and capital of Najafabad County
column8: 158 families. It is located west of Isfahan and is increasingly becoming a part of the Isfahan Metropolitan area.

column1: Najafabad is the birthplace of Grand Ayatollah Hossein-Ali Montazeri
The city serves as a trade center for agricultural products in the region
column2: and is noted for its pomegranates and almonds. One of the attractions of Najafabad is the "Arg-e Sheykh Bahaie" that has recently been repaired.

column1: Najafabad is home to the Islamic Azad University
